A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First and foremost\, this is not a good film. On top of that\, this is not a good Star Wars film. The movie is filled with plot lines that make no sense and/or go nowhere\, characters with inexplicable behavior\, and slapstick the likes of which we all hated in the prequels. \n\nOn top of that\, the movie does not do justice to existing Star Wars characters or lore\, and that goes both for old and new.
